present.reason: Linguistic rule: მო uses მი forms for present

imperfect.reason: Linguistic rule: მო uses მი forms for imperfect

present.english: The experienced manager invites the good worker
The strict teachers invite the helpful assistant

imperfect.english: I was inviting the new employee
The experienced manager was inviting the good worker
The strict teachers were inviting the helpful assistant

future.english: I will invite the new employee
The experienced manager will invite the good worker
The strict teachers will invite the helpful assistant

aorist.english: The experienced manager invited the good worker
The strict teachers invited the helpful assistant

optative.english: I should invite the new employee

optative.georgian: გამოცდილმა მენეჯერმა კარგი მუშა უნდა მიიწვიოს
optative.english: The experienced manager should invite the good worker

optative.georgian: მკაცრმა მასწავლებლებმა დამხმარე ასისტენტი უნდა მიიწვიონ
optative.english: The strict teachers should invite the helpful assistant

imperative.english: You all (you formal), invite the large group

present.english: The experienced manager invites the good worker
The strict teachers invite the helpful assistant

imperfect.english: I was inviting the new employee
The experienced manager was inviting the good worker
The strict teachers were inviting the helpful assistant

future.english: I will summon the new employee
The experienced manager will summon the good worker
The strict teachers will summon the helpful assistant

aorist.english: The experienced manager summoned the good worker
The strict teachers summoned the helpful assistant

optative.english: I should summon the new employee

optative.georgian: გამოცდილმა მენეჯერმა კარგი მუშა უნდა მოიწვიოს
optative.english: The experienced manager should summon the good worker

optative.georgian: მკაცრმა მასწავლებლებმა დამხმარე ასისტენტი უნდა მოიწვიონ
optative.english: The strict teachers should summon the helpful assistant

imperative.english: You all (you formal), summon the large group
